roleset.name: to conspire
roleset.note: COLLUDE-V NOTES: frames created by Jena based on EBC corpus; nominal 'collusion' based on BOLT-7; adjectival 'collusive' based on BOLT-7. (from collude.01-v)
COLLUSIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from collusive.01-j)
COLLUSION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from collusion.01-n)

example.name: collude-v
example.text: Americans thought that since al-Jazeera TV station broadcast these activities of terrorists, it must be colluding with terrorists.
example.arg: Americans thought that since all-Jazeera TV station broadcast these activites of terrorists

example.name: collusion-n
example.text: In some areas , China and America work in collusion with each other ; so some small countries , while hating America and finding China unreliable , again have to suck up to America .

example.name: collusion-n: arg0
example.text: It was at that time that I began to doubt if there was collusion between the two hell companies .

example.name: collusive-j
example.text: Therefore , the evaluation of Ma Ying - jeou as " incapable " was inaccurate . Ma Ying - jeou is very cunning and collusive .
